Talk_2016:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>The meal on this poster sure looks tasty,
doesn't it?
Talk_2000:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Ah...<sp:5:0:0> Forgive me.<sp:5:1:0> I do hope I wasn't<sp:5:0:0> in
the way.
Talk_2001:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_01>It's a simple recipe. Just stew some fresh
seafood with Hylian tomato. <sp:5:0:0>It's not just
delicious but nutritious too!
<sp:3:0:2:0801>So once Tye comes home from—<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0501>Ah, excuse me...<sp:5:0:0> Once my husband comes
back from his travels in the north, this is
the meal I plan on cooking for him.
Talk_2002:
I used to get the fresh seafood to make
this from <clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff> out east of here.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>But that was before it got attacked by
<clr:0000>pirates<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0> Ah,<sp:5:0:0> what am I to do?
Talk_2010:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00><clr:0000>Lurelin Village <clr:ffff>was such a cheerful place.<sp:5:0:0>
What's become of it now?
Talk_2005:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>That's the meal I want to feed my
husband, Tye, when he gets back from
his travels.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>Unfortunately, <sp:5:1:0>acquiring the ingredients
has become complicated.<sp:0:4:0>Normally, if you were in the market for
seafood, <clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff> would have
anything you could need.
Unfortunately, I hear they've been
attacked by <clr:0000>pirates<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0> What am I to do?
Talk_2011:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think_00>My dear husband, Tye, said he was going
alone on a journey up north to find
something to protect me with.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I admit, it's lonely being away from my
dear husband, but our hearts are always
connected.<sp:5:0:0> At least, I like to think so.
Talk_2006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat>That's the meal I want to welcome Tye—
my husband—home with once he's back
from his travels.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Unfortunately, <sp:5:0:0>ever since <clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>
was attacked by pirates, fresh seafood
has been much harder to come by.
Talk_2012:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think_01>Hmm. <sp:5:0:0>I wanted to cook a nice meal for
my husband's return, but pirates have
attacked <clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Where am I going to get my hands on
fresh seafood now?
Talk_2007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Lurelin is a lively, peaceful little fishing
village. You can get there by taking the
road east from this stable.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>It makes for a wonderful vacation spot,
too, especially if you're a fan of seafood.

<sp:3:0:2:0101>I don't think I'll ever forget<sp:5:0:0> the trip I took
there with my darling Tye.
Talk_2013:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Now that <clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff> is free of <clr:0000>pirates<clr:ffff>,
I was hoping to go buy some seafood.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>But what if my wonderful husband, Tye,
returns from his travels while I'm away?

<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>He'd surely worry if I were gone...<sp:5:0:0> Should
I wait patiently for him to come back?
Talk_2008:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>It's awful to imagine that wonderful place
falling victim to <clr:0000>pirates<clr:ffff>.
Talk_2014:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>I want Tye, my husband, to come home
from his travels to a wonderful meal.
Talk_2009:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>I heard that Lurelin Village just suffered
a pirate attack, but I'm afraid I don't know
the particulars.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>It does sound as though the attack sent
all the visitors scattering, however.

<sp:3:0:2:0301>Ugh. <sp:5:0:0>All those poor people.
Talk_2015:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>If my darling Tye came back while I was
out, I'm sure he'd worry.

I was hoping to buy fresh seafood from
<clr:0000>Lurelin <clr:ffff>for his welcome-back meal, but...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>I'd hoped the <clr:0000>pirates<clr:ffff>' defeat would spell
the end of my problems. <sp:5:0:0>I suppose I'll
keep sitting here, waiting.
